name: Hubble
0:
”Alexa, ask hubble to tell temperature”
”Alexa, ask hubble to disable motion recording”
”Alexa, ask hubble to play lullaby”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: hubble
des:
The official Alexa skill for the Hubble Connected for Motorola Monitors App. Use Alexa with your Hubble Connected account to manage your home and baby camera monitors. Turn motion detection/recording on/off, play lullabies on baby monitors, check temperature and even watch your Daily Video Summary / Baby Video Sleep Diary* . Alexa support for Motorola Halo camera also includes commands to control night light and projector.

* Requires Hubble subscription plan
